name: F01080-001 – DHR Production Route Sheet - Rev.01
description: WI-11991 – To initiate Production Route Sheet
sql_for_additional_access: select user_id from [BsWebService].[dbo].[activeEmployees] where (company='BIT Singapore' and ([function]='Quality' or [function]='Operations' or [function]='Manufacturing')) or user_id in (SELECT [user_id]   FROM [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_admin])

data_configuration.name: Associate Material Issuance Template
data_configuration.sql_statement: select 'F01080 – DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01' as value

data_configuration.name: Check Chosen Template
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [DHR_check_chosen_template] '@@template_name','$$selected_order_no'

data_configuration.name: Production Order List
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
	select  d.process_matrix_id, d.label, d.value from bpm_process_detail d
inner join bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id
where d.process_matrix_id in(
					select  process_matrix_id 
					from bpm_process_detail dd 
						inner join bpm_process_matrix mm on dd.process_matrix_id=mm.id
						inner join bpm_process pp on mm.process_id=pp.id and mm.process_revn=pp.revn and pp.status='close'
						inner join bpm_process_template t on t.id=pp.process_template_id and t.name='$$mtl_issue_tmpl' 
					where dd.label='status' and dd.value='in progress' 
				)

) detailResult 
PIVOT (
	MAX(value) 
	for label in (
		[Please Choose Production Line],
		[Please Choose Production Line Sub-group],
		[order No],
		[Production Order Display]
	)
)
as material_issuing_table

data_configuration.name: Find Last Route Sheet ID or Order No
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_prod_route_sheet_find_last_route_sheet_id_or_order_no] '$$mode','$$order_no','$$station','$$existing_proc_id','@@template_id'

data_configuration.name: Material_Issuance_header_detail
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select top 1 * from (
    select p.id as process_id,d.process_matrix_id, d.label, d.value 
    from bpm_process_detail d  WITH (NOLOCK)
    inner join bpm_process_matrix m WITH (NOLOCK) on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
    inner join bpm_process p WITH (NOLOCK) on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close'
    inner join bpm_process_template t WITH (NOLOCK) on t.id=p.process_template_id 
        and t.name='$$mtl_iss_tmpl'
        --and t.name='DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01'
    and  d.process_matrix_id in(
            select process_matrix_id 
            from bpm_process_detail  WITH (NOLOCK)
            where [label]='Order No' 
            and [value]='$$orderNo'
            -- and [value]='210000162552'
        ) and d.process_matrix_id in(
            select process_matrix_id 
            from bpm_process_detail WITH (NOLOCK)  
            where [label]='status' and [value]='in progress' 
        ) 
    ) detailResult  
PIVOT ( 
    MAX(value) 
    for label in (
        [Order No],
        [Material], 
        [Material Description], 
        [Store Location], 
        [Plan Qty], 
        [Batch No], 
        [Start Date], 
        [Revision], 
        [Drawing Number], 
        [Alt BOM], 
        [Drawing Rev#], 
        [End Date], 
       [Remarks],
        [Please Choose Production Line], 
        [Please Choose Production Line Sub-group]
    ) 
) as material_issuing_table

data_configuration.name: Material_Issuance_item_list_detail
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
			select d.process_matrix_id, tc.row_index,tc.label, tc.value from [dbo].[bpm_process_table_cell] tc
			inner join bpm_process_detail d on 
				tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id  and d.label='item list'
				inner join bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator' and 
				m.id in  (
					select process_matrix_id 
					from bpm_process_detail dd 
						inner join bpm_process_matrix mm on dd.process_matrix_id=mm.id
						inner join bpm_process p on mm.process_id=p.id and mm.process_revn=p.revn and p.status='close'
						inner join bpm_process_template t on t.id=p.process_template_id and 
						--t.name = 'DHR Production Material Issuance - Rev.01' 
						t.name = '$$mtl_iss_tmpl' 
					where dd.label='Order No' and  dd.value in (
						select top 1 * 
						--from string_split ('210000171081','-'))
						from string_split ('$$orderNo','-'))
					)  			
		) tableResult 
		PIVOT (
		        MAX(value) 
			for label in (
				[Item Cat],
				[Item Code],
				[Item Code Desc],
				[Quantity],
				[Unit],
				[SS],
				[Qty Actual],
				[Batch/Serial No],
				[SLED],
				[Sloc],
				[Alt Gp],
				[AltG Pr]
			)
		)
		as material_issuing_item_list

data_configuration.name: Set Route Sheet Sequence
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_prod_route_sheet_set_sequence] '$$mode','$$order_no','$$existing_proc_id','@@template_id'

data_configuration.name: Team Lead
data_configuration.sql_statement:
SELECT user_id   FROM [BsWebService].[dbo].[activeEmployees]  where company='BIT Singapore' and [department]='Production Singapore' and 
([job_title] like '%Team Lead%' or 
[job_title] like '%Supervisor%' or 
[job_title] like '%Manager%' or 
[job_title] like '%Director%') and [user_id]!='$$initiator_id'

data_configuration.name: Production Station List
data_configuration.sql_statement:
SELECT CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY [Process Station No] ASC) AS VARCHAR) +' - ' +[Process Station Description] as prod_station
  FROM [BpmTemplate].[dbo].[DHR_process_stations_mgt]
  where [Production Line]='$$prod_line' and
  CHARINDEX([Applicable Sub-Group],'$$sub_grp,All')>0

data_configuration.name: Retrieve Route Sheet History for Equipment Check
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select  [Equipment Name],
                [Equipment ID],
                [Calibration Due Date], 
				[Maintenance Due Date],
                [Parameter Description], 
				CASE 
				 WHEN '$$mode'='Amend existing' THEN [Parameter Value]
				 ELSE NULL
				END as 
				[Parameter Value],
                [Remarks]
    from (
            select tc.row_index,tc.label, tc.value 
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_process_table_cell] tc	inner join 	
             [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
			 on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id and d.label='Equipment Check'
                inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
                inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn 
                and p.id= '$$target_process_id' and p.status='close'
            ) detailResult  
        PIVOT ( 
            MAX(value)  
            for label in (
                [Equipment Name],
                [Equipment ID],
                [Calibration Due Date], 
				[Maintenance Due Date],
                [Parameter Description], 
				[Parameter Value],
                [Remarks]
            ) 
        )  pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Retrieve Route Sheet History for Chemical Check
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select * from (
            select tc.row_index,tc.label, tc.value 
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].[bpm_process_table_cell] tc	inner join 	
             [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
			 on tc.parent_process_detail_id=d.id and d.label='Chemical Check'
                inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
                inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn 
                and p.id= '$$target_process_id' and p.status='close'
            ) detailResult  
        PIVOT ( 
            MAX(value)  
            for label in (
                [Chemical],
                [Batch Number],
                [Expiration Date], 
                [Remarks]
            ) 
        )  pivot_table

data_configuration.name: Sum of Current Shift Qty
data_configuration.sql_statement: parseInt($$accept_qty)+parseInt($$reject_qty)+parseInt($$test_qty)

data_configuration.name: Sum of Current Position Qty
data_configuration.sql_statement: parseInt($$previous_shift_qty)+parseInt($$accept_qty)+parseInt($$reject_qty)+parseInt($$test_qty)

data_configuration.name: Material Issuance Attachment List
data_configuration.sql_statement: EXEC [dbo].[DHR_attachment_by_matrix] '$$pid','initiator','Attachment List','yes'

data_configuration.name: Operator List
data_configuration.sql_statement: select user_id, [first_name]+' '+[last_name]+' ('+[user_id]+')' as operator from activeEmployees where  company='BIT Singapore' and [department]='Production Singapore' and user_id !='$$initiator_id'

data_configuration.name: Wrong template alert
data_configuration.sql_statement:
`

You chose wrong revision of template! Please use the correct revision: ${'$$correct_template'.split("|")[1]}

`

data_configuration.name: Equipment Data
Set Data when Mode Changes
Copy Shift
data_configuration.sql_statement: "$$selected_shift"

data_configuration.name: Copy Station
Copy Sequence
data_configuration.sql_statement: "$$route_sheet_sequende"

data_configuration.name: Retrieve data by Existing PID
data_configuration.sql_statement:
select  [Shift],
		[Station],
               [Please Select Mode] as [Selected Mode],
		CASE
			WHEN [Please Select Mode] = 'Amend existing' THEN [Original Initiator] --when mode is Amend Existing, use original initiator of the existing process
			ELSE [Initiator]
		END as [Original Initiator],
		CASE
			WHEN [Please Select Mode] = 'Amend existing' THEN [Original Completion Date] --when mode is Amend Existing, use original Completion Date of the existing process
			ELSE close_on 
		END as [Original Completion Date],
		[Work together with],
		[What has been changed],
		CASE
			WHEN [Selected Line Verification Approver] IS NULL THEN e.first_name+' '+e.last_name+' ('+e.user_id+')' 
			ELSE [Selected Line Verification Approver]
		END as [Selected Line Verification Approver],
		CASE
			WHEN [Line Verification On] IS NOT NULL THEN [Line Verification On] 
			ELSE (select top 1 mtx.action_on
					from bpm_process_matrix mtx inner join bpm_process prc
					on mtx.[type]='approver' 
					and mtx.process_id=prc.id 
					and prc.id='$$existing_process_id'
					--and prc.id='prd-rs-01-20230818162149' 
					and prc.status='close' ) 
		END as [Line Verification On]

from (
			select p.close_on, d.label,d.value
			
			from bpm_process_detail d 
				inner join bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id 
				inner join bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn 
				and p.status='close' 
				and (m.type='initiator' or m.type='action-taker')
				and p.id='$$existing_process_id'
				--and p.id='prd-rs-01-20230818162149'
			) detailResult  
		PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Shift],
				[Please Select Mode],
				[Station],
				[Initiator],
				[Original Initiator],
				[Original Completion Date],
				[Work together with],
				[What has been changed],
				[Line Verification Approver],
				[Selected Line Verification Approver],
				[Line Verification On]
			) 
		) as pivotTable 
		left join [BsWebService].[dbo].[func_get_all_employees](DEFAULT) e 
		on e.user_id=pivotTable.[Line Verification Approver]

data_configuration.name: Chemical Check Query Result
data_configuration.sql_statement: select [Chemical Check] from [BpmTemplate].[dbo].[DHR_process_stations_mgt] where '$$selected_station' like '%'+[Process Station Description]+'%'

data_configuration.name: Chemical Check Data
Find  initiator of open process with same station and shift
data_configuration.sql_statement:
DECLARE @combinedString VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT  @combinedString = COALESCE(@combinedString + ', ', '') + e.first_name+' '+e.last_name+' ('+e.user_id+')' 
from (
select  d.label, d.value,p.id as processId,p.initiate_by		
			from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail d 
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_matrix m on d.process_matrix_id=m.id and m.type='initiator'
				inner join [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process p on m.process_id=p.id and m.process_revn=p.revn and 
				p.status!='close' and p.status!='cancel' and p.status!='reject' and p.status!='rework'
				--and p.process_template_id='IT-20220811153141'
				and p.process_template_id='@@template_id'
				and  d.process_matrix_id in(
					select process_matrix_id 
					from [BsWebService].[dbo].bpm_process_detail
					where label='Order No' and value='$$order_no'
					 --where label='Order No' and value='210000196576'
				) 
) detailResult
PIVOT ( 
			MAX(value)  
			for label in (
				[Order No],
				[Station Hidden], 
				[Please Select Shift]
			) 
		) as route_sheet_table 
		inner join activeEmployees e on e.user_id=initiate_by
		where 
		[Please Select Shift]='$$shift' and 
		[Station Hidden]='$$station'
		--[Please Select Shift]='Shift 1st' and 
		--[Station Hidden]='1 - Stent Deployment Process (WI-10784)'


 select ISNULL(@combinedString,'n/a') as value

formula_list.formula: C8=(function(){function getDateYYYYMMDD(d){return [   d.getFullYear(),   ('0' + (d.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2),   ('0' + d.getDate()).slice(-2) ].join('')} return parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date(C3)))-parseInt(getDateYYYYMMDD(new Date())) })()
